a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global airline passenger capacity and traffic
Available kilometers is a measure of passenger carrying capacity: it is the number of seats available multiplied by
the number of kilometers flown. Passenger seat kilometers measures the actual number of kilometers flown by
Data source: International Civil Aviation Organization via Airlines for America (2023)
